name: Click to Twenty
description:
Click to Twenty is a fan sequel to funl and cheman's "Click to Ten". 

How To Play

  • Open Game
  • Press Start
  • When you see 0 click LMB
  • When you see 1 click LMB
  • When you see 2 click LMB
  • When you see 3 click LMB
  • When you see 4 click LMB
  • When you see 5 click LMB
  • When you see 6 click LMB
  • When you see 7 click LMB
  • When you see 8 click LMB
  • When you see 9 click LMB
  • When you see 10 click LMB
  • When you see 11 click LMB
  • When you see 12 click LMB
  • When you see 13 click LMB
  • When you see 14 click LMB
  • When you see 15 click LMB
  • When you see 16 click LMB
  • When you see 17 click LMB
  • When you see 18 click LMB
  • When you see 19 click LMB
  • When you see 20 click LMB
  • Now You Win!!!
